translationtableentry.text: Conquer Britain
Capture as many strongholds as possible to force your enemies to surrender.
translationtableentry.result: Conquista tantas fortalezas como te sea posible para que tus enemigos se rindan.

translationtableentry.text: Agricola must survive
Gnaeus Julius Agricola must survive in order for Britain to be conquered.
translationtableentry.result: Gneo Julio Agrícola debe sobrevivir para que Britania pueda ser conquistada.

translationtableentry.text: Protect Londinium
The town of Londinium must not fall in enemy hands.
translationtableentry.result: La ciudad de Londinium no debe caer en manos enemigas.

translationtableentry.text: Senator Publius
Senator Publius is more than eager to help you. His services, however, come at a price. Should you decide to make use of his aid, just select him.
translationtableentry.result: El Senador Publio convencerá al emperador para que te ayude. Sin embargo, Roma necesita oro para ayudarte. Si decides requerir su ayuda, habla con él

translationtableentry.text: British chieftains
There are some enemy chieftains that roam near Londinium. Defeat their armies and they will join you along with their tribes.
translationtableentry.result: Hay algunos jefes enemigos que vagan cerca de Londinium. Derrota a sus ejércitos y se unirán a ti junto con sus tribus.

translationtableentry.text: Enemy shipyards
The British have some shipyards in their possession. Capture them to stop the constant arrival of enemy reinforcements.
translationtableentry.result: Los britanos tienen algunos puertos en su poder. Conquístalos para detener la constante llegada de refuerzos enemigos.

translationtableentry.text: It might be useful to use the caves to travel from one part of the island to another, because they allow you to attack the unsuspecting enemies from behind.
translationtableentry.result: Las cuevas pueden resultar muy útiles para moverte rápidamente de un lado a otro de la isla, porque te permiten atacar a los enemigos desprevenidos por la espalda.

translationtableentry.text: Stonehenge location
If you bring your priests to this ancient Stonehenge, they will be able to perform powerful rituals that have an effect throughout the entire island.
translationtableentry.result: Si llevas a tus sacerdotes hasta el antiguo lugar de Stonehenge, podrán realizar poderosos rituales que tendrán efecto sobre la totalidad de la isla.

translationtableentry.text: Path to Stonehenge
This cave leads to the powerful Stonehenge where ancient rituals were performed. Should you take your priests there, you can make use of its power.
translationtableentry.result: Esta cueva conduce hasta Stonehenge, un mágico lugar en el que se realizaban rituales arcaicos. Si llevas a tus sacerdotes allí, podrán hacer uso de su poder.

translationtableentry.text: If you capture Mancunium, the archers defending the wall that divides the island in two will stop being a problem, as long as you control the city.
translationtableentry.result: Si conquistas Mancunium, los arqueros que defienden la muralla que divide la isla en dos dejarán de ser un problema, mientras controles la ciudad.

translationtableentry.text: The enemy army
The barbarian Calgacus has amassed an enormous army and has set forth Londinium. Defeat him along with his army and Britain will be yours to control!
translationtableentry.result: El bárbaro Calgacus ha reclutado un enorme ejército y se dirige hacia Londinium. ¡Derrota a él y a su ejército y Britania será tuya!
